hymn.title: We love You, Lord, we love You
hymn.chords: | C - G - | Am - C/E - | Dm - C/E F | C/G - G - | C - E7 - | Am - F - | C/G - G7 - | C - - - |

layout.singingstanza: We love You, Lord, we love You. You are al -- to -- geth -- er love -- ly. We've seen Your beau -- ty Here in the church, in all Your saints.

lyrics.stanza: We love You, Lord, we love You. You are altogether lovely. We've seen Your beauty Here in the church, in all Your saints.
